item.title: Why I'm Taking a Break From School in 2022
item.description: Disclaimer: The title of this post is somewhat misleading, as I am still technically enrolled as a full-time student, but I am taking the absolute bare minimum amount to remain eligible for my scholarships that require me to stay a full-time student (I still don’t even understand the rules given I’d be saving the university money by not taking classes, but I digress). By no means am I saying that everyone should do this, however I think it’s the best decision for some people under some super specific conditions.
